issue.title: gzclient misses parts of model if started simultaneously as gzserver

content.raw:
(Reply via miha...@gmail.com):

I've noticed this also and was about to create an issue.

This was happening for me in cases where a link contained a large number of
visuals. What was happening was the visuals topic queue was overflowing and
messages getting lost. Increasing the queue size fixed the issue for me.
content.html:
(Reply via miha...@gmail.com):

I've noticed this also and was about to create an issue.

This was happening for me in cases where a link contained a large number of visuals. What was happening was the visuals topic queue was overflowing and messages getting lost. Increasing the queue size fixed the issue for me.
